tweets_content:
Possessing marijuana can be a felony under federal law; outrageously, trafficking guns is not..
Dobson says all of the charges against Lonna and Chris are felony charges..
Drug charges filed against owners of marijuana-related businesses.
Charges reduced for six Washington minors hit with felony marijuana possession -  #marijuana #thepotblog..
Owners of marijuana-related businesses, groups face felony drug charges.
As felony charges on #marijuana bizs rain down, both State and those charged say its all about publicity.
Three facing felony charges in Glenwood shooting
